pages.text: They're everywhere!$(br)T-The faces, why so many eyes?$(br2)Four $(thing)carved runes$():$(br)One of $(thing)Reality.$()$(br)One of $(thing)Travel.$()$(br)One of $(thing)Space.$()$(br)Build a frame from the $(thing)blackened stone$(), six blocks high.
pages.title: Journal Entry

pages.text: Include the $(thing)carved runes.$()$(br)At the center in the base of the frame, insert a $(thing)Carved Rune of Power$(). this is the focus. This takes the keys.$(br)13 of the $(thing)blackened stone$(), 5 $(thing)carved runes$().$(br2)What I have opened cannot be closed.
I have spread the first four runes in dungeons and temples everywhere, to stop anyone from re-releasing the horrors within.$(br2)I will smash this one to pieces, so that it may never be used again.
The fifth key rune must be hand-crafted from a combination of $(thing)unpowered runes$() and an $(thing)ender eye$(), imbued into a central blackened stone. Something like this
May $(thing)Krasaun$() bless you, for your soul will never be the same again.
